content: find the free version of this pattern on www tlycblog com 1 ## **about the fresh market tote** ## equal parts practical and pretty the fresh market tote is a great reusable market bag for trips to the grocery store book store and to hold your crochet and knit projects made with two strands of yarn held together it is both sturdy and colorful special thanks to my friends at joann stores for their support on this collaborative project get the supplies for the fresh market tote at your local joann ## **pattern highlights** ## sample made with lion brand cupcake and 24/7 cotton held together -practice the modified granny stitch a new twist on an old classic -pattern written in us terms with detailed instructions // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns 1 http //www tlycblog com
